sentences.cn: 政治上错综复杂的局面

sentences.en: I had seen something of this imbroglio at first hand.
sentences.cn: 我曾经亲眼看到过这种乱七八糟的东西.

sentences.en: Justice and conspiracy dispute. Money and love imbroglio. Strong and weak game.
sentences.cn: 正义与阴谋的较量, 金钱与爱情的纠葛, 强势与弱势的博弈.

sentences.en: Lately there had been big problems facing him, quite apart from tonight's imbroglio.
sentences.cn: 最近他面临着许多重大问题, 还不算象今天晚上这样混乱.

trans.tran_cn: 一团糟，错综复杂的局面
